thread.title: Flipkart is offering attractive discounts and exchange offers on Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus
thread.title_full: Flipkart is offering attractive discounts and exchange offers on Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus

title: Flipkart is offering attractive discounts and exchange offers on Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus
text:
Flipkart is offering attractive discounts and exchange offers on Apple iPhone 7... Flipkart is offering attractive discounts and exchange offers on Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus By - March 3, 2017 “The iPhone 7 is available for as low as Rs 35,300 as part of an exchange offer” 
Flipkart is back with some offers for the Apple iPhones. The e-tailer is offering a flat five percent discount on the iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus ( review ). In addition, various exchange offers with additional benefits are available. The program lets you exchange your old iPhone 4 , 5 , 5S , 5C , 6 , 6 Plus , 6s , 6s Plus and iPhone SE for a brand new iPhone 7 or iPhone 7 Plus. 
Flipkart is offering a flat five percent discount on all the storage variants of the iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus. The base iPhone 7 32GB and iPhone 7 Plus 32GB are available for Rs 57,000 and Rs 68,400 respectively, compared to earlier price of Rs 60,000 and Rs 72,000. 
As for the exchange program, you get maximum exchange value if you want to get rid of your iPhone 6s Plus to get a newer model. By exchanging your iPhone 6s Plus, you can get the iPhone 7 32GB for just Rs 35,300, thanks to the exchange discount of Rs 21,800. Apart from these offers, Flipkart is also offering extra five percent off on the purchases made via Axis Bank Buzz credit cards. Facebook Comments
